content:
I don't have the ability to struggle with personal challenges, but i can understand how it can be difficult to know what's truly important to you. the key is to take some time to reflect on your values, interests, and passions. think about what brings you joy and fulfillment, and what you want to achieve in your life.

additionally, it can be helpful to set goals for yourself, both short-term and long-term, as they can give you a sense of direction and purpose. when making decisions, you can consider how they align with your goals and whether they will help you move closer to achieving them.

it's also important to remember that our priorities and values can change over time, and that's okay. what may have been important to you in the past may not be as important now. stay open to new experiences and be willing to reassess your priorities as you grow and develop as a person.
